Tailored VPS
Servers tailored to your needs.

Tailored VPS was founded in February 2011 with one goal in mind: to provide clients with a fully customizable VPS solution. Tailored VPS is backed by several investors in order to provide our clients with first class hardware and connectivity.

Our business model is based on allowing clients to build the VPS Hosting plan that fits their budget and needs perfectly. We allow every feature of the VPS to be customized including: CPU Cores, Memory, Disk Space, Bandwidth, and more! We do not limit you to premade plans.

Use the coupon code SUMMER2012 to receive a 19.2% discount! Prices starting at only $4.00/month after discount!
